title: Should He Confront His Wife's Best Friend About Their Romantic Past?
description:
Before he married his wife, he hooked up with her best friend. He never told anyone, but he's afraid the secret is out because of how her best friend's husband looks at him.
Should he confront her before the news spears to his wife?
